Pegatron replies: I'm pegatron,a saboteur and a spy of the maximals 
elite force. I'm coming back from my last sabotage mission and since 
then I've got five preds on my tail,but I've stolen one of their 
fighter to escape the faster I could so you will target six preds 
fighter and if its needed I'll eject myself to destroy the enemy.

> ::Prowl::
> 
> "Sure, I'll handle it."
> He presses the respond button on his comm unit.
> "This is Maxiaml Commander Prowl. Identifie yourself, and give a 
full
> report. I'll try to get you some help."
